SDG_GOAL: Goal: 6 Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
SDG_TARGET: Target: 6.6 By 2020, protect and restore water-related ecosystems, including mountains, forests, wetlands, rivers, aquifers and lakes.
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator: 6.6.1 Change in the extent of water-related ecosystems

SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator: 6.6.1 Change in the extent of water-related ecosystems
